name: Asteroid Mining Station
description: Taria: Midnight track, orbital shadow. Win — I talk. Lose — forget her name.

name: Gas Giant Rings
description:
Joan: Experimental ship hull. Pulled from a test bay we weren’t supposed to touch.
Sonya didn’t leave feedback... or a trail.
If it holds, it’s yours.
Just don’t ask where it came from.

name: Icy Moon
description: Nolan: The track winds through the icy satellite of Hexanova-9, tight turns and broken pathways. If you clear the debt, I’ll fix that file for you.

name: StarChaser Colonial Ship wreckage
description: Tear through the shattered guts of a Corp ship. Trigger scanners, make noise, draw all the heat — while Roxy cracks their server for Sonya’s coordinates.
